content.webTitle: Escape's picks of the week: The self-drive trip

fields.headline: The self-drive trip
fields.bodyText: Explore the wave-shaped sand dunes and sleep under the stars in the Empty Quarter of Oman on a 12-night trip with Safari Drive (01488 71140). Starting with two days at the white beach at Salahah, you then pick up a Land Cruiser and collect a Bedu guide who will lead you into the desert. You'll stay at a nomadic camp in Wahiba Sands and journey on to the plateau of Al-Jebel al-Akhdar. You finish with two days at a luxury hotel in Muscat. From £1,990pp.
